// {{{ NX.Object.getSize

/**
 * @class NX.Object
 */

/**
 * @method getSize
 *
 * "write it"
 *
 * @param o {Object} xxx
 * @return {Object}
 */
module.exports = function(object) {

    var size = 0, property;

    for(property in object) {

        if(object.hasOwnProperty(property)) {
            size++;
        }

    }

    return size;
};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
